product.title: Scamp Saves the House | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Scamp Saves the House

Based on the popular Disney animated film Lady and the Tramp, this novelization recounts the adventures of Lady and Tramp’s rambunctious pup, Scamp. High-spirited Scamp has difficulty behaving as well as the other puppies, but he becomes a hero when he saves the family home from fire.

Tie-in Activity: Using the near tragedy of Scamp’s family home as inspiration, develop a fire escape plan with your child. Discuss the location of smoke detectors, safe exit procedures, and review how to call for help in the event of an emergency.
